bool QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::reportFailure ( ProbeSetGroup &  psGroup,
QuantMethod &  qMethod,
const IntensityMart &  iMart,
std::vector< ChipStream * > &  iTrans,
PmAdjuster &  pmAdjust 
) [virtual]

If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is called rather than the normal report call above.

By default does nothing.

Parameters:
psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.
